backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing stories, comments, categories, and night mode with CRUD-style query and update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing components, files, and metadata for diagnosing a deployment build failure.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all main frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light and dark theme variables and applying global background and text settings.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for home, category, story, and search pages using SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/AdSlotPlaceholde: UI placeholder component displaying a styled mock advertisement slot.
frontend/src/components/AffiliateLinksPl: UI placeholder component showing sample affiliate link items for horror book recommendations.
Displays comments for a story and allows authenticated users to post new comments.
frontend/src/components/HeaderNav.tsx: Responsive site header with navigation links, search toggle, and Internet Identity login controls.
Button component that toggles night mode using a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/SearchBar.tsx: A search bar component with input, clear button, and submit handling that triggers onSearch with the query.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Defines the main site layout including header, content outlet, and a footer with branding and external link.
frontend/src/components/StoryCard.tsx: Displays a story preview card with category, date, title, excerpt, and a link to the full story.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useComments.ts: Provides hooks to fetch comments for a story and add new comments via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useNightMode.ts: Manages night mode state with localStorage persistence and a toggle function.
frontend/src/hooks/useStories.ts: Hooks for fetching latest stories, category stories, individual stories, and search results via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based horror theme styling with dark colors, custom fonts, and scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/lib/categories.ts: Defines story categories and helper functions to look them up and get their labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Renders a category page with header, ad slot, and list of stories for the chosen category.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing a hero section, ad slot, and latest stories grid.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Implements the search page, reading the query from router params, calling useSearchStories, and rendering search UI, loading states, and story results.
frontend/src/pages/StoryPage.tsx: Displays a full story fetched by ID, showing metadata, night-mode styling, content, and sections for ads, affiliate links, and comments.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
